19 typedef boost::mpl::push_back<Scalars, CelltreeNode<sizeof(Index), 1>>::type VectorTypes1;
20 typedef boost::mpl::push_back<VectorTypes1, CelltreeNode<sizeof(Index), 2>>::type VectorTypes2;
21 typedef boost::mpl::push_back<VectorTypes2, CelltreeNode<sizeof(Index), 3>>::type VectorTypes;
22 
23 template<typename T, class allocator>
24 int shm_array<T, allocator>::typeId() {
25  const size_t pos = boost::mpl::find<VectorTypes, T>::type::pos::value;
26  static_assert(pos < boost::mpl::size<VectorTypes>::value, "Scalar type not found");
27  return pos;
28 }
29 
30 template<typename T>
31 const ShmVector<T> Shm::getArrayFromName(const std::string &name) const {
32  typedef vistle::shm_array<T, typename vistle::shm<T>::allocator> array;
33 
34  if (name.empty()) {
35  return vistle::shm_array_ref<array>();
36  }
37 
38  auto arr = vistle::shm<array>::find_and_ref(name);
39 
40  if (!arr) {
41  return vistle::shm_array_ref<array>();
42  }
43  assert(arr->shmtype == ShmData::ARRAY);
44  if (array::typeId() != arr->type()) {
45  arr->unref();
46  return vistle::shm_array_ref<array>();
47  }
48 
49  auto ref = vistle::shm_array_ref<array>(name, arr);
50  arr->unref();
51  return ref;
52 }
53 
54 template<class Archive>
55 void shm_name_t::save(Archive &ar) const {
56 
57  std::string n(name.data());
58  //std::cerr << "SHM_NAME_T save: '" << n << "'" << std::endl;
59  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name_t", n);
60 }
61 
62 template<class Archive>
63 void shm_name_t::load(Archive &ar) {
64 
65  std::string n;
66  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name_t", n);
67  auto end = n.find('\0');
68  if (end != std::string::npos) {
69  n = n.substr(0, end);
70  }
71  if (n.size() < name.size()) {
72  std::copy(n.begin(), n.end(), name.data());
73  name[n.size()] = '\0';
74  } else {
75  std::cerr << "shm_name_t: name too long: " << n << " (" << n.size() << " chars)" << std::endl;
76  memset(name.data(), 0, name.size());
77  assert(n.size() < name.size());
78  }
79  //std::cerr << "SHM_NAME_T load: '" << name.data() << "'" << std::endl;
80 }
